title: Aggression - assertion
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aggressiveness (Psychology)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Assertiveness (Psychology)
description: Episode of Series "Moral Decision Making". By showing causes and expressions of aggression and self-assertion in a family and neighbourhood situation, this film aims to motivate classroom discussion. When assailed by the hostility of his brother and unable to retaliate, Joe goes off with his friends. In the course of their walk Joe see a radio on top of a garbage tin and becomes embroiled with Ed who also wants possession of the radio. Various responses which people might make in this situation are depicted.
